title: Tom Schlatter from You & I, The Assistant and Every Scar Has A Story
itunes:title: Tom Schlatter from You & I, The Assistant and Every Scar Has A Story
description:
I am extremely excited to have my friend, Tom Schlatter on the podcast today. He emailed me close to 20 years ago, and since then we have stayed in and out of touch but his bands You & I, The Assistant, This Ship Will Sink and more recently, Hundreds of AU and Every Scar Has A Story have been very important to my life. We discuss his life in bands, eclectic music tastes and of course "screamo." Dip in and enjoy!

Visit Rockabilia and use the code PC100WORDS for 15% off of your order.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
